lead_paragraph: England would be hard-pushed to find a better manager than Steve Bruce, according to Hull City captain Curtis Davies, who believes his former boss would be the ideal candidate to replace Sam Allardyce.

headline.print_headline: Bruce Ideal for England, Says Hull Captain
headline.main: Bruce Ideal for England, Says Hull Captain

snippet: England would be hard-pushed to find a better manager than Steve Bruce, according to Hull City captain Curtis Davies, who believes his former boss would be the ideal candidate to replace Sam Allardyce....
